pages.title: Stoneskin
pages.text: Stoneskin is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#916f49)$(l)essence of earth and stone$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to increase their resistance to damage at the cost of speed with each successful strike.

Stoneskin is a powerful runic power that can give the wielder an edge in battle by increasing their durability. $(br2)The decreased speed can be a drawback for characters that rely on speed and mobility, but the increased resistance can make up for it in certain situations.
